name: get_web_links_id_trash
description: Retrieves a web link that has been moved to the trash.

web_link_id.description: The ID of the web link.

fields.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the
response. This can be used to request fields that are
not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
fields for the mini representation are returned, additional
to the fields requested.

$ul: **created_at**: When this file was created on Boxâ€™s servers.

**etag**: The entity tag of this web link. Used with `If-Match`
**id**: The unique identifier for this web link
**item_status**: Whether this item is deleted or not. Values include `active`,
**modified_at**: When this file was last updated on the Box
**modified_by**
**name**: The name of the web link
**owned_by**
**parent**
**path_collection**
**purged_at**: When this file will be permanently deleted.
**sequence_id**
**shared_link**: The shared link for this bookmark. This will
**trashed_at**: When this file was last moved to the trash.
